div.head: 橫逆
div.div: [birth of a child] in a transverse postion and in a position contrary to normal.

bibl.title: Ben cao gang mu dictionary Vol1

entry.def: [birth of a child] in a transverse postion and in a position contrary to normal.

sense.def: Pathological Condition Combined Designation of heng sheng 橫生 , transverse birth, and ni sheng 逆產 , delivery [of a child in] a position contrary to normal. Qian jin bei ji fang 千金備急方 2: 亦治橫逆生者 , “They also cure births [of a child] in a transverse postion and and in a position contrary to normal ”.
